Pizzerinho

Reviews

That was the case with pizzeria X. I trusted local opinions and I was not disappointed.

However,taking into a consideration that in the area of 50 kilometers it’s the only one restaurant, I would highly recommend this restaurant!

Well, when you want to eat pizza in X, the best option is to go to X restaurant. The pizza is so tasty so I couldn’t recommend it more.

For sure I will often come back to this place, together with my family.

Since I am a vegan, I usually struggle with finding a restaurant that offer food I can eat. So much restaurants offering only meats.
